website_summaries.verdict: A supportive and well-designed mattress topper that gets top marks for its quality and design.
pros: Users praise this model for its incredible comfort and good design that allows it to fit well over an existing mattress
It also stands out for providing pain and pressure point relief
cons: A few users report it does not stay in place

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the reviews!!
customer_reviews.text: We've owned 4 memory foam toppers in the past few years, and this is the worst topper we have ever purchased...It offers no support at all, sinks almost all the way to our mattress, making our spines twist awkwardly, and every morning we wake in pain. I weigh under 100 pounds (side sleeper), my husband weighs 170 (back sleeper), so we aren't heavy people, but this mattress still sinks ridiculously. I often find myself rolling to the end of our bed because of the mound created between us and the indentation on my side. BUYER BEWARE. We've had this topper for only a month, and I'm already looking for a new one. I'll never trust LUCID again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth T.

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart and ripped after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this topper, I felt it was extremely soft , too soft for my needs , but additionally within 6 months of usage it started to tear in 2 areas and eventually the topper tears grew. I contacted the company for a refund which they would not provide. I sent at least 3 emails mails and have not heard anything. I hesitate to write negative review but I feel I have a legitimate complaint that has not been rectified . Would not order again
customer_reviews.author: whatsapp

customer_reviews.title: We were going with the trend that a firmer mattress would be good for our backs
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had purchased a new mattress. We were going with the trend that a firmer mattress would be good for our backs. After months of a sore back we had to do something! We found this jewel! We sneak chances to lay in our bed now!!! This pad is amazing. I feel like I'm sleeping on a cloud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality. Started seeing cracks with in 2 days of use
customer_reviews.text: Warning! Don't buy. It is comfortable BUT- smells slightly, you will start seeing cracks on gentle usage. See attached pictures. Feel cheated. Can't even return as the packing box is trashed and the sponge swell 5 times to fit any reasonable box with out any further damage.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: I am finally very comfortable sleeping at night on my Gel Memory Foam Mattress ...
customer_reviews.text: Being in 7+ major car accidents and being 75 years old, I am finally very comfortable sleeping at night on my Gel Memory Foam Mattress Topper! What a big relief! Recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON L. TAFT

customer_reviews.title: I love this mattress topper
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress topper!!!! If anyone is planning to purchase a new mattress, before you invest that kind of money, please do yourself a favor and purchase one of these first.
customer_reviews.author: J.D. W.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort to the tenth power! 😊
customer_reviews.text: I had been sleeping on a futon for nearly 20 years before late December 2017 when I purchased a Zinus Memory Foam 12 Inch Green Tea Mattress and I have been in heaven ever since! Then I came across this LUCID topper and after reading a ton of positive review's I decided what the heck, lets see if there isn't a bit more sleeping comfort to be had and yes there certainly was more to had! 5 STARS ACROSS THE BOARD, thank you LUCID!
customer_reviews.author: JWJ

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I gave this one star for softness. But after having this for one week I discovered that it was coming apart. It was placed on top of the mattress, then a mattress cover on top of the foam topper & then sheets. It is comfortable..but poorly made since it doesn’t last past a week. Already boxed up & ready to ship back to Amazon for a full refund. Thank God for Prime.
customer_reviews.author: JAJ

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last .... its like disintegrating
customer_reviews.text: Its very comfortable and we were happy with it. Fast forward a year and two months ... when changing sheets I just noticed the structural integrity of the foam is giving way. When pressed on cracks can be seen in the foam .... this is not in just the area where normal body contact is made. It has been inside a temperature controlled home and used by a couple in our late 60’s (no crazy or rough activity on it). Really strange. Have had several foam toppers this was a top off the list until this - never seen this before with any previous memory foam products.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in September, put it on the bed at Thanksgiving as we arrived here for our winter months...within a week I as in dire pain. I am now currently seeing a chiropractor and every time I go he says still sleeping in that memory gel pad? I say yes, I don't have a clue how to return it, it's huge not to mentioned it seems to be a hassle to get a replacement or some assistance...so don't buy!!!!! Very flimsy and no support, you sink in and cant get out.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice topper, my new memory foam mattress was quite stiff but this makes all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but this topper is the best investment hands down. My back would be so sore, and I there would be a slight dip in the center of a new mattress. The topper allows me to sleep on my side and it forms around me and gives my back 100% support. I woke up without tossing and turning, and had to write this review.
customer_reviews.author: JayPay

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I have a new mattress again
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I have a new mattress again! It's so comfy I don't ever want to leave my bed! Me and my cat 100% recommend this mattress topper! Who cares if it's not a full 3-inches or whatever, it's so dang comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this mattress pad been all my life!? After months of waking up sore and stiff, we finally decided to invest in a memory foam pad for our bed. This one has good reviews and fell on the low side of mid range pricing so I went with it. Boy am I glad I did! We LOVE our bed now! We sleep better and wake up comfortable and rested. Bonus: it minimizes the distribution of movement on the mattress. We are no longer leaning toward my husband's side of the bed. And I find it much easier to move or leave the bed when one of the kids are in it without disturbing them. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mattress topper - extends the life of a mattress
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this mattress topper! I bought it for the old mattress in my guest room, so that I wouldn't have to replace the whole mattress, which was very uncomfortable for my guests. According to my mom and my in-laws (our most frequent house guests), this mattress topper is very comfortable, and like sleeping on a new mattress. It feels like a memory foam mattress - my mom pointed out that it is not what she is used to with a regular spring mattress (it conforms to the body and sort of holds you all night), but once she got used to the difference, she loved it. It was also comfortable for her hip pain throughout the night.
customer_reviews.author: Anna B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but so hott!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using it for about 2 weeks. It does make the bed more comfortable however, it is HOTT! Even with the air conditioner and fan right on me, I still wake up numerous times a night very over heated. But it is very comfortable. Feels a lot like my parents very expensive memory foam mattress and for the price you cant go wrong. My boyfriend seems to love it though, so if you don't get over heated easily this is perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: IS DEFINITELY AS ADVERTISED!!!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I'll mention is depending on how thick your mattress already is, you'll probably need a deeper fitted sheet. It didn't have a bad smell to it and no stains. I only let it inflate for about 12 hours before I placed it on my bed, and I feel like I have a new mattress again! It's so comfy I don't ever want to leave my bed! I'm very impressed and I would absolutely recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Bad back review, body sinks.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several gel and memory foams. After spending several hundreds of dollars deciding it wasn't for me. It would make me sink and feel trapped. I don't weigh much 140lbs. If you have a bad back and have a hard time with motion due to pain. This is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Dionisio-Buniao

customer_reviews.title: NOW What to do with it?
customer_reviews.text: Two major problems: 1. You get absorbed into the foam which makes it uncomfortable to sleep on. It was put on top of a Tuft & Needle king size. I removed it and put in storage. 2. Was always creeping away from edge and leaving mattress below exposed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awful!! ZERO SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product after throughly researching and am rather confused as to the positive reviews here and elsewhere. There is ZERO support with this topper. Both my husband and I started experiencing pain within a few days of use and removed it altogether after 2 weeks. It was dreadfully hot as well. Not sure if the reviews are just fake or if we got a poorly made version, but was a total waste of money with the added joy of back & body pain.
customer_reviews.author: BondGirl007

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort...BUT......
customer_reviews.text: Sleeps wonderful!!! BUT as soon as we unboxed and layed out on bed, there were 2 cracks. So obviously the material or quality is lacking!!! Now just wondering how long this will last without being in pieces or chunks!! Adding picture to see the cracks.
customer_reviews.author: tedebear

customer_reviews.title: Amazing memory foam!
customer_reviews.text: Best memory foam topper ever!!! I looked at so many and went with this one and I am so happy I did!!! Best sleep I have had in a while in my bed!!! No smell at all for me like some complain of and it's fluffed right up as I pulled it out of the package! Get this topper if you want a nice memory foam one!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Does not provide support
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the least-dense memory foam I’ve ever felt. I’ve had one half as thick that weighed more. This topper is mostly air. And as such, it crushes down very easily and doesn’t provide support. Initially, it can make a hard mattress seem softer, but after a while of laying on it, you basically sink through and it winds up being even less comfortable than without the topper. The only reason I’m continuing to use it is that the extra 3 inches to sink down into is enough to prevent my arm from falling asleep when sleeping on my side. Otherwise, I find it makes things worse when sleeping on my back.
customer_reviews.author: M B

customer_reviews.title: Works Good for 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: when i bought this pad at first i loved it. very comfy my back felt great every morning I was very happy. but after owning it for 6 months my back started hurting again. the support of the foam just stopped and i was in major back pain again. so i ended up just buying a brand new mattress all together. so.... the pad work good for a limited time. ONLY buy if you need fast relief that won’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Weaver

customer_reviews.title: very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I got this mattress topper because I didn't want to jump in and buy a new mattress currently. It wasn't so bad that I needed one but I wanted something comfier to sleep on. This 3 inch is definitely hard to use most sheets with but it does provide comfort while lying down on it. I do feel like I'm sinking into it when I lie on it but I don't feel like it sleeps hot or anything. If you are on the fence about buying a new mattress give this a try. it doesn't have a weird smell and will give you a few more years on your mattress.
customer_reviews.author: LocomOean

customer_reviews.title: So frustrated I could cry
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe that I didn’t even get a chance to test out this thing because right out of the box it was torn in a few places the box was completely destroyed I went through so much to get this thing and now I’m gonna have to deal with trying to return it and getting a new one
customer_reviews.author: LIndsay Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Not So Great
customer_reviews.text: This item is just a large piece of soft density B-grade memory foam. It did not make my bed any more comfortable. The "gel infusion" and "ventilation holes" seem to be just sales gimmicks that don't really accomplish anything to control temperature as advertised. Because of that, there are plenty of cheaper equivalents on Amazon, so I can't recommend this one. Also, as other reviewers have mentioned, potential buyers should also be aware that this item is effectively non-returnable because it ships vacuum-compressed so tightly that it's all but impossible to repack.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product if you need a California King size!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time we have bought this product. In both cases the mattress was a regular King, not a California King, even though the box is shipped in was clearly marked "California King." Apparently the manufacturer doesn't realize the California king mattresses are sized differently. They are wider and not quite so long. After the second one arrived, we decided to just live with losing a couple of inches on either side of our bed. Returning yet another one seemed like too much work. The topper is comfortable and does ease hip pain. I just wished the size was correct.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P. Jenney

customer_reviews.title: Ripped & Disintegrated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this topper about 2 years ago to use in our guest room. It got very little wear since we only have guests once every few months. After 1 year it was already wearing down and not comfortable to sleep on. There was no support. After 1.5 years, it literally started disintegrating. Recently it ripped clean apart when attempting to roll it. Not worth the money at all. I would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: This is a great topper!
customer_reviews.text: This worked wonders making my firmer bed much more comfortable and cooler with the gel memory foam. I highly recommend this for anyone with an uncomfortable bed. The only reason I gave 4 stars is because like many other people say there are some issues with the initial quality. The corner of my topper was slightly cut and ripped off. Not a huge deal so not a major complaint to me, but I saw some people get major cracked and ripped items. Overall really happy with the comfort and cooling of this topper.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T.

customer_reviews.title: 5 Month review, 1.5 ft tear without heavy use
customer_reviews.text: The 3" is too thick and I would suggest getting the 2" instead. You literally sink into it. Which is not as bad as it sounds. It holds you in place and I found I don't toss and turn as much. Although 5 months into owning it without "heavy use" if you get my meaning and there is a 1.5 ft tear in the middle of it. Still comfy but it is noticeable. There really is no reason to buy the 3" though. Trust me when I say if you buy the 3" you'll only slightly regret it and wish you got the 2" instead. Comfy and worth it, but the 2" would be a better value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott S.

customer_reviews.title: Motorhome mattress
customer_reviews.text: Got this to make our motorhome mattress more comfortable. Cut to fit the shorter length and it works perfect. We ended up putting it beneath the other mattress because my husband likes a firmer bed and it works great! Used a zip up cover to hold the two mattresses together. Works great! Very comfortable for both of us!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Libonate

customer_reviews.title: Worst sleeping experience
customer_reviews.text: I slept on this 3" topper for a year and finally put it under my mattress this week. I'm so disappointed in this topper. The purpose in purchasing this was to make sleeping better. I swear this has caused strange injuries to me in different parts of my body due to sinking so much and making me sleep in weird angles. And no it's not my mattress that makes this memory foam topper bad. I sleep better without the topper. $100 is now under my mattress as I try to figure a way to use the memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Best comfort and sleep ever!
customer_reviews.text: As I had stated in my customer review, This topper is like having the Stay Puff Marshmallow Man massage you with his fingers. This topper is a great inexpensive way to modify the mattress situation while deployed and getting some much needed rest. This is my 4th deployment and my 4th mattress topper I have ordered and I'm telling you it is the best investment anyone can make. It really is hard to get out of bed when your that comfortable, but all it does it makes you look forward to another goodnights rest! Hope this helps and thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Archangel

customer_reviews.title: Too warm for me
customer_reviews.text: It's soft & cushy but it gets hot. I put my Ralph Lauren topper & mattress pad on top of it to stay cooler. If you're wondering... I'm 50yo. I've bought several mattresses in my life. The soft comfy padding on top seems to go flat after about 6 years. I replaced to mattresses under warranty. When the 3rd mattress died, I decided to stop buying mattresses. They're sooo much effort to replace. Heavy... Have to hire movers to get them up/down stairs, etc.. So I have a cheap, firm mattress and 2 toppers on it. We'll see if this works any better...
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: It needs to "air out" for 48 hours before putting it on your mattress.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it, so he would give this a 5 star rating. The first night we had it on our mattress, I slept soundly. After that, I have been the one that struggles to get into bed with the extra height! I know this could be remedied with a foot stool and that may be what I have to use. I also get rather warm when sleeping and this seems to promote additional heat, which again, my husband loves. The value was in the price and we do wake up with fewer aches and pains.
customer_reviews.author: Mge

customer_reviews.title: the worst!
customer_reviews.text: too soft and spongy....ignore the glowing reviews and pay attention to the negative (authentic) reviews instead. in addition, it magnifies your body heat until you wake up in a sweat. worst of all, there is no way to squeeze it back in to the box to return it so if you still want to buy it, consider it final sale. sadly, I'm out the money I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: sallie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: My wife convinced me that we needed a firm mattress. I hate it. After several years, I'd had my fill and decided to do something about it. Enter the Lucid 3-inch. It's incredibly comfortable and it conforms to your body nicely. I don't use pillows, so this cradles my head nicely. 3 inches is pretty tall, so I was worried if our fitted sheets would fit, but no worries. After about 3 months, I can with confidence that it's completely changed my sleeping experience....and because it's only on one side of the bed, it offers "gentle leverage" when we're being naughty. LOL

customer_reviews.title: Too soft & Wake up sore
customer_reviews.text: I hate to say it, but this thing is too soft. We tried this memory foam mattress topper. At first, it felt amazing. Then a couple days in your body starts to hurt quite a bit because there isn't enough support. You fall into the bed and your body starts to use your back and ab muscles to support yourself even though you don't feel it until you wake up very sore. We were very excited about this product but turned out we just went straight back to just the mattress we have, without the topper.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping like a baby on this bad boy add it with a Nectar Mattress you are GOLDEN
customer_reviews.text: Sleeping like a baby on this bad boy add it with a Nectar Mattress you are GOLDEN I need to buy a king verson as I have a king bed now but man when it's cold this is the TICKET If you sleep hot I would avoid it but during the cold time it's perfect I love it GAME CHARGER in sleeping make sure your mattress is nice and flat as you will sink into this like a baby
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase but not in summer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about ordering the 2" size and concerned about whether the mattress would smell or move around during use. My concerns were completely unfounded. The 2" depth is perfect. There was only a slight odor which dissipated within a couple of hours. The mattress stays in place when using it. I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase. My back stiffness upon awakening is greatly diminished and I am sleeping more soundly. Now that summer temperatures have arrived, the mattress is very hot...uncomfortably so. It has kept me awake.
customer_reviews.author: MBMHR

customer_reviews.title: Description should have said firm
customer_reviews.text: We decided to replace an older topper with this one because of the great ratings. This is a very firm topper, almost felt like a piece of plywood. Good thing we have sleep number bed so we could reduce the number of the main mattress. That helped quite a bit, and the reason the overall ratings is four stars, not the three that are the feature ratings.
customer_reviews.author: anony

customer_reviews.title: Customer pays 100% shipping for returns, about 40$,
customer_reviews.text: First off, let me warn people about returns. I have to pay probably about 40$ to return this because it’s sold by lucid or whoever is selling through amazon. I would highly consider reading all negative reviews on this and base your decision on them. It is very soft, and you do sink. I did. No way. I’m going to have to regift this or hang onto it for camping. I’m Not paying over half the cost of shipping it back. To bad I didn’t read fine print first. I wanted to get this in my review so others could see.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Enhancer
customer_reviews.text: This 2-inch foam product really does make the mattress more comfy...but you have to accept that it feels much "softer" when you first start using it. At first I thought it was a bit warm and would not offer the needed support. I'm OK with it now after a month. No backaches or anything to suggest that I am not getting enough support. Winters coming so I can use the slightly warmer foam. Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Before You Buy, Try.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after an article review gave the Lucid mattress topper the highest rating out of several other brands. I specifically looked for a mattress topper that provided support for neck/back pain. I have a bulging disc in my neck region and a herniated disc in my lower back. I was curious how a memory foam mattress topper would provide relief, but against my better judgment I decided to give the product a try. In retrospect I should have consulted with my chiropractor before making this purchase. I would strongly recommend Amazon reviewers take this step, conferring with your medical provider, before investing in any type of sleep system.
customer_reviews.author: DProctor

customer_reviews.title: Best one I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I've seen some negative reviews but I bought it anyway. Man, I'm I glad I did! Very comfortable and not hot like people described. I laid it out on the bed for maybe 4 hours and it plumped up just fine. I didn't notice any smell at all and slept on it the first night. People mentioned that it tends to slide but all toppers do that. Just reposition when you make up your bed every week! I have a mattress pad on top of it which I recommend. All together a very nice purchase. I would expect to replace it maybe every year but that goes for any topper.
customer_reviews.author: johnnytrucknuts

customer_reviews.title: I am not satisfied at all with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am not satisfied at all with this purchase. It makes me retain heat in bed and it definitely is very uncomfortable as when you are laying on it it conforms to your body... one would think this would be comfortable but as you go to turn or roll over you have to raise up over a hump or get out of your current position it def is not what i imagined and am regretful to have invested in this as I cannot comfortably use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I ordered this 3 inch topper to place on top of a 1 year old 15 inch foam mattress that was too firm. I was waking up every night with my hips and back aching (I'm a side sleeper), so I decided to try this memory foam topper. I've had it on the bed for a week and it's been heavenly. I'm no longer waking up several times a night with my back hurting and have been sleeping soundly!
customer_reviews.author: TAZ

customer_reviews.title: Feels comfortable but makes you hot
customer_reviews.text: Thickness was as described and did fit under the fitted sheets. Make sure you have deep pocket fitted sheets if you have a thick mattress. It did seem to help with some of the back issues we were having but it started making us very hot and have back sweats in the middle of the night. We ended up returning because it just ended up not addressing the issues we were having. It was a real pain to return because of course you can’t shrink it back into the box. Make sure this is what you want before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Functional but quality fails to meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: Product ordered 6/3/19 and was slept upon for the first time of 6/5/19 It's now 7/16/19 The topper is utilized on a quality, firm, full mattress by one adult. Whereas the topper does provide comfort, we are skeptical as to its longevity. The topper has developed deep 'cracks' in various areas. We expect these cracks to become fissures and eventually extend surface-to-surface rendering the topper scrap & useless. We are attempting to contact Amazon and seller for a replacement as a product such as this should have a long "shelf-life". Edit: as of 3/30/20, the cracks have become fissures as anticipated and extend through-and-through.
customer_reviews.author: WebShopper

customer_reviews.title: 1 of 2 - Comfortable but not Cool at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress topper for two main reasons 1- back pain 2- cooling effect After some nights sleeping on it, I can say one of two. Back pain gone, but ... Nights sweats no, probably they're worst. Conclusion: if you are looking something to get rid off your back pain, go ahead, if you're looking for some cooling effect, this is not your product.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect topper for dorm rooms!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this mattress topper. I've never had a memory foam bed so it was literally a treat to sleep in my dorm room with this. All my friends with mediocre mattress toppers were envious of me because I had this. It's extremely comfortable, and doesn't make you hot. I think it's a pretty affordable price for the value. It doesn't slide around with normal sleep unless you really force it, but I do have this mattress protector that helps hold it in place along with regular sheets. Only thing is it is a little hard to store or transport unless you vacuum seal it. But what other mattress topper would be easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: WangChung

customer_reviews.title: Not for
customer_reviews.text: Was sleeping one night at a friends house and thought wow great I need it, ordered it but the same time I got a cast on leg no weight bearing and spend most of the day in bed, impossible to turn or reposition, you sink down in a hole, at 1 am I had to call a freind to save my night got me out of bed and remove the pad, if you are limited in movements not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Lake

customer_reviews.title: Its not cool
customer_reviews.text: The topper on the first day of sleeping on it was very soft which was nice at first. Within an hour of being asleep, I was sweating and by the end of the night not happy. Tried it again to see if turning the AC higher would help but the topper was the issue. On a very positive note, the seller was excellent and took the return back without question and THAT IS important.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID L.

customer_reviews.title: Need a new mattress? Don’t get rid of your mattress until you try this first!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were considering buying a whole new mattress until we entertained the idea of a mattress topper. We chose this one and turns out, it was a good choice! Before purchasing we would wake up with back aches and hardly any sleep. The first couple of nights we had this on our bed, we slept through the night and woke up rested without the aches. We’ve had the top for about a month now and I don’t have any complaints. This decision was way cheaper than buying a whole new mattress. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY VERY SOFT
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much of a smell to the topper. It only took about 10 min to get to it's 3" dimension and to be flat with no divots, much quicker than the instructions say. This topper flattens easily when you sit or lay down on it. I find that it's just about worthless, however, my husband loves it and goes on and on about it. In his opinion it has made the 14" LUCID mattress that we got useable. I also feel that it makes the bed warmer than what it was before we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have tried 100 different things
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a " firm" mattress as I have back issues, only to find that my sleep quality suffered for it and I missed that feeling of crawling into a cloud and looking forward to going to bed. I have tried bed toppers galore, only to have to return them in 2 days because I literally can't walk after sleeping on them. I kept the box for this for weeks , expecting I was going to have to return it. To my great delight, no back issues and I literally can't wait to crawl into bed again every night. Best money I have spent all year!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Not a good mattress
customer_reviews.text: I am presently at the three month mark of owning this mattress, and it was a complete waste of money. The claim of “memory foam” Is laughably false; three months in, the foam has compressed divots in the precise shapes of our bodies. We had to add 4 inches of actual memory foam padding to make this bed comfortable enough for a relatively decent night of sleep. This would work for a guest bedroom (it was VERY comfortable, for...maybe a week?), but not for a bed that is used nightly.
customer_reviews.author: Julia M Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Squishy but to warm while we sleep
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely squishy. Not sure it relieves any pain because it does mash down to nothing where you lay. It’s hot in my opinion, not sure why they list it as “cooling” because it is not at all cooling because I got hot on night one. I may need to up my sleep number pressure to counter the squish. *Update/: July 26,2020.one month into use we have tears in it already. Multiple areas and sizes of tears. It also moves or worms a bit under the protective cover I put on (doesn’t come with one)
customer_reviews.author: T&D

customer_reviews.title: Not for cool sleep.. too hot
customer_reviews.text: This does not keep you cool while sleeping. Actually it made me sweat even more. I only slept on it about 4 night and took it off my bed. If you like sinking feel of a Tempur-pedic type mattress this is great for you. I hated it. Mold you body in heat and hard to turn over. Does nor give a cooling at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: NO OTHER CAN COMPARE
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I tried many mattress toppers prior to this one. We were literally ready to give up when we decided to try just one more. We're greatful we did. This topper provides the PERFECT amount of comfort AND support. I have severe bone and muscle pain. I'm 5'11" and 250lbs. My wife is 5'7" and 125lbs. This topper works perfectly for us both. You will definitely sink into it but only in accordance with the separate weights your body possesses. It's amazing. Simply amazing. Unlike any other available. Those other brands are either too soft or too darn firm. This is in the middle and exactly what we had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: After reading multiple reviews, on various mattress toppers, I chose this one. It did not disappoint. Within 24 hours it was totally expanded to 3 inches and fit my queen size bed perfectly. I have hip pain when I sleep and the pain has nearly gone away. I highly recommend this product, so much so, that my mother has now purchased one. It's also cat approved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: It's not the top notch product as one would hope, but it definitely does the job. The product is better than what people would expect for the price, but don't expect a $1,000 comfort value in exchange for the price. My sleep quality has improved after using the memory foam. One small issue I have is that It came with a defect in one corner of the mattress (there was a 5" cut, so I have to be careful not to pull the mattress by that corner), but it doesn't affect the overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ezzy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product. Description inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. Does not offer pressure-relieving comfort as in the description. My husband and I wake up in way more pain. You automatically sink in which makes it very difficult to move and get out of the bed. The ventilation does not provide comfortable sleep climate as mentioned. It sleeps very HOT. Very disappointed. Not sure in how I can return as it was vacuum sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Crystallynn McNutt

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress topper
customer_reviews.text: Nice topper. Make sure to air it out for 48 hours in a well-ventilated room like the instructions say. You'll need deep pocket sheets to fit on top of the topper and your mattress. Or, you can do what I did and go one size up (I have a full size mattress, but I am using queen size sheets.) I weigh 160 pounds and 3 inches is more than enough foam. 2 inches would probably be just as good. If you are used to a hard mattress, you won't get as much back support, but you will be able to fall asleep easier and roll on your sides better. I definitely prefer this over my rock hard bed.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Best Memory Foam Topper!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most absolute best memory foam topper I've ever purchased! We have a Ghostbed which is not a memory foam bed whatsoever and is stiff and uncomfortable for me. Needed a topper and we've purchased this one before in a 4 inch and we loved it for a while till we felt stuck and couldn't get out of the bed! This 2 inch one is absolutely perfect! So comfortable and hugs every form of the body! Don't wake up in pain or with aches! Definitely recommend! Will always buy this if we ever need a new one!
customer_reviews.author: DJDB5

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE READ NOT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN!!!!
customer_reviews.text: IF YOU HAVE SENSITIVE SKIN DO NOT USE!!! I loved this mattress topper for comfort and really good nights rest, it relieved my back pain. But after a few night of sleeping in it I broke out in a terrible allergic reaction that was so bad I had to be sent to the emergency room, thought I was going crazy!!! Sad to return it because of how good my Sleep was but I’m still breaking out in bad hives while I’m heavily medicated due to this mattress topper. Hope to find another like it comfort wise.
customer_reviews.author: Omgtiffany

customer_reviews.title: Lucid 3” Gel memory foam
customer_reviews.text: The 3” topper is a little too thick for my liking. My wife and I both felt that it was difficult to turn with the topper on the mattress. Also, we noticed that it started tear near the holes which causes concern for the durability of this mattress. I think 1-2” would be a better option, but, 3” is definitely not the right choice for us. We took it off and will be getting rid of it soon.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this mattress topper so much that I purchased one for my mom and dad and also my sister. Omgness....like the best comfort imaginable... My mom lives in an assisted living apt and she has bragged about hers to the nurses, therapists and friends, neighbors of hers. She told them just to lay on it and now they are all purchasing the same “Lucid” topper! I’m needing a full size one for my guest room now but am just waiting for a little extra money. There are no other toppers like Lucid seriously, so save your money and I definitely recommend the Lucid!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Back breaker
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I can say is you get what you pay for. I bought this for 85.00 and after 2 weeks it has been sitting in my garage until I can re-purpose it. The biggest problem was that it collapses to form to your body and stays flattened out so you have little if any push back/support for your hips/shoulders. It's like sleeping on a mound. Anyhow, I replaced it with a 165.00 one from Costco and it resumes its shape and gives good soft support.
customer_reviews.author: shopidaho

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: Update: bought this product a second time. It went too soft about 2 weeks in. Our backs and necks hurt all the time. It even seemed a little different out of the box. Not sure what happened, but it definitely does not seem right. I feel like I'm turning into a taco at night from sinking in, in the wrong spots. Im 155 pounds at 5'9", so it's not that it can't handle me. Going to have to buy something else. Lasted about 2 years. Had to flip it around quite a bit but it did it's job. Had to flip it around quite a bit but it did it's job. Overall it was a decent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick

customer_reviews.title: What kind of sorcery is involved here...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lucid because my new mattress is a dried turd. Like a giant dried up hard turd which I despise- shame on your Simmons Beautyrest- shame on you. Anywho- I slapped this bad boy on top of the dry turd sandwich and magic happened. I am convinced there is black magic involved with the level of amazing squish and floating that goes on when this thing hugs you. My the gods bless you all at Lucid for taming the turd beast I’m stuck with. Oh and I didn’t wait 48 hrs before I used it. Google says- it’s not necessary for a topper. Used it 6 hours later.
customer_reviews.author: PandaJosie

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: So this topper is thick. I thought that would be comfortable but it’s too thick and I sank into it. It caused lower back pain. It was also so hot during the night. I managed to fit it back into the packaging box but found out the cost to return it is almost as much as it cost to buy. Now I don’t know what to do with it and wasted my money. I would’ve liked to try a one inch topper instead. Be careful to think about how much you want to sink into your bed. Your spine is not straight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Topper doesn't offer any support. Sinks in.
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like giving a negative review but I feel like I really need to point out a couple of things about this product. I am a side sleeper. I purchased this topper for hip and shoulder relief. Unfortunately this topper doesn't offer any support. You sink right in. And, not in a very comfortable way. I ended up having terrible back pain on top of hip/shoulder problems the next day. I do NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gow_1978

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long!?!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a firm mattress, maybe side sleeping is hurting your shoulders, hips and low back.. Then this topper is for you! Works perfectly on top of a firm mattress. I woke up without numbness in my arms for the first time in years. If this is the case for you, don’t wait. I woke up peaceful, comfortable and ready for today! Do it! You deserve it!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: A still and sound sleep
customer_reviews.text: I have never been a fan of memory foam, but my SO has always loved them. After thorough research, we landed with the 3 inch gel ventilated. I was skeptical at first since I do not like the feeling of sinking into foam. However, we both experienced the best sleep we've had in years! I usually toss-and-turn, but I slept still and in comfort. My SO usually sleeps hot, but this topper did not provide any additional heat (we usually sleep with fan on). Our bed still remains on the firm side, which I prefer. We both look forward to getting into bed now !
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Finally sleeping in comfort!
customer_reviews.text: My firm queen mattress was reaching the 5 year mark and getting less and less comfortable by the day. I regularly woke up with pain in my lower back and was pretty sure the mattress was at fault. Rather than shell out lots of money on a new mattress, I bought this mattress pad. And boy am I glad I did! It's so soft and cozy. My back has improved and the pain has all but disappeared! If you are on the fence, please just go for it. Your back will thank you. Pro tip: be sure to buy the deep pocket sheets to use with the mattress topper.
customer_reviews.author: carole

customer_reviews.title: Held up to 600lbs of fat.
customer_reviews.text: Me and my husband are a couple of fatties that are in bad shape. Our knees and hips hurt because we are fat as hell and dont want to do anything about it. This bed pad has held up to us rolling around like a couple of walruses on a sandy beach. All kidding aside, WELL, WELL worth the money. I have bought these for family memebers too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Muszynski

customer_reviews.title: too soft in the center on a king mattress
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because we recently flipped our king Tempurpedic mattress after owning it for almost 13 years, and after flipping it, it was too firm. The LUCID 3 inch topper softened our night of sleep, which we hoped for, however, when in the center of the bed, it felt like you were sinking in. It seemed as if it was only 'safe' to sleep on the edges of the bed. Additionally, this topper made the bed quite warm for me. It's definitely NOT a cooling topper. I'm giving it 3 stars, however, because it was not uncomfortable even after taking the drawbacks into account.
customer_reviews.author: JAvon

customer_reviews.title: I bought this cause it was listed as the perfect size for our california king bed and reviews stated ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cause it was listed as the perfect size for our california king bed and reviews stated it stays cool or warm, well it was about 2 inches smaller than the bed (and I measured first) and it is extremely warm to lay on, but it is comfortable, never had a smell but laid it out for 48 hours prior to placing on bed, so maybe the size will match as it fully opens, needs a cover as the sheet stick to it and get all wonky , will post update as it happens
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother or waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this topper. It is soft and thick and, yes you sink all the way into it. My complaint is that one side got totally smushed down and the other isnt. Yes I only sleep on one side of my bed but it's only been 3 months I would expect it to hold shape better! So now I need to toss it and get a new one so it's not bizarrely uneven.
customer_reviews.author: Retail Therapy Patient

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: It was conformable but it is too thick and you literally sink. I mean, it's even hard getting out of bed, and sex.. Forget it. I took it off my bed, rolled it up and we will use it for guest. The quality was good, and I imagine if you got say a 1" or 2", it would be better. I'm telling you, don't buy the 3", you will be sorry. I'm not sure if I could of returned it, but there is no way to get it back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

customer_reviews.title: Not really gel as suggested.  No cooling vs non-gel foam mattress.
customer_reviews.text: It's soft and turns your mattress into a Plush. But, it does not have the blue appearance in the product images. It's somewhat blue. The gel and ventilated claims seem very exaggerated. Due to the plush nature, it seems to be warmer than our Zinus Green Tea mattress since you sink into it more. See the included pic. Strongly considering returning it. But, if you have an old, hard and low-profile mattress... this may be a good upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: autotkgrad

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a cloud!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a king size memory foam mattress a few months ago and my husband loves it, but I hate it. It's just too firm for me. I purchased a twin size LUCID mattress pad just for my side of the bed and it's probably the best idea I've ever had. I slept so much better last night with no back or hip pain this morning. It was very easy to unpack and set up. As some of the reviews have stated, this pad needs to be placed on a firm mattress or it could be a little too soft for some people.
customer_reviews.author: Glitter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. You feel supported yet weightless and it’s cool👏
customer_reviews.text: We have always used a topper due to back problems. We were comfortable on the one we have used for the past five years until I started having hot flashes. I realized my topper was making them worse due to the heat it held. I found this one that claimed to be cooling and also provide pain relief. My husband and I are thrilled with this topper!! We realized we were so not comfortable before. This is supportive, yet weightless and it does indeed stay much cooler while sleeping. Once you change positions... it cools immediately!! We are so grateful for a good night sleep!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Brown

customer_reviews.title: Gets very sweaty very quickly
customer_reviews.text: This topper is soft, but that is negated by the fact that it doesn't breath whatsoever. Before I get too deep, let me give you some background info - 1) yes I have central air conditioning, and 2) no I'm not overweight (5'7" 170lbs). Anyway, within 10 minutes of laying on this topper, I get hot and uncomfortable. I've tried at least 4 different types of sheets and nothing helps. It's not made out of anything natural. It feels very similar to a grocery bag sticking to you or something. I'd shop around for something else or get another mattress.
customer_reviews.author: RedHairedTrev

customer_reviews.title: The Only one to bye is Tempur-pedic Tempur Supreme!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on one certain persons recommendation who swore by it! Dumb! This doesn’t fit my queen bed which has no extra padding! It’s to short. Slips around the bed depending on what side you sleep. You have to buy special fitted sheet which is a struggle to get on. Lesson learned. The TEMPUR-PEDIC TEMPUR SUPREME MATTRESS IS SUPERB! The only one you will ever use! A lot more money but worth it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darius Sandvig

customer_reviews.title: Ah what a feeling
customer_reviews.text: I love the comfort of this topper. After a hard day you come home and lay down on your bed and say ahhhh every time. You have to make sure you have deep sheets to fit over this and your matress and getting out of your bed if more difficult since you sink down into it. Also if you find yourself performing extra curicular activities on it, you may find that you have to make some new adjustments due to your hands and or knees sinking lower and the other person sinking as well. But all in all its a great price and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: ED Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Our memory foam mattress was too firm. We wanted a firm mattress, because we both like more support when sleeping - in the past I had a memory foam bed that was too soft. I sunk too low and I had lower back pains. However, we felt our mattress was too firm now and it was hurting my shoulders and neck (side sleeper). At first I thought this topper was too soft, I sunk down in a bit. But I've been sleeping on it for a week now and I have no back pain AND no shoulder pain! It's absolutely wonderful. I don't want to get out of bed in the morning. It's like being cradled all night long.
customer_reviews.author: dawn767Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and sleep better  but doesn’t cool very well.
customer_reviews.text: This topper didn’t take long to fluff up and I’ve had the best sleep since. Sleeping on it was wonderful. It didn’t slide around the bed at all like other toppers that we’ve tried did. I’m a back sleeper but tend to roll around a lot throughout the night but since using this topper I’ve been an lot steadier and get a deeper sleep. My only complaint is that the cooling gel technology didn’t really work. The topper itself is really comfortable but if anything, our bed was a lot warmer than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Robertson15

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the price
customer_reviews.text: We have had this mattress topper for a couple of months now. You can't beat the price or comfort. I wake up each morning with less shoulder and back pain than previously. As far as cooling comfort, I do notice a little difference but not much. All in all--highly satisfied. Yes--I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your expecting quality of sleep less pain & more comfort this is not it
customer_reviews.text: Before I reviewed this item I decided I needed to be fair & sleep on it awhile. It has been more then 2 months since my purchase & I have not gotten the results that I expected. I expected a better increase of sleep quality & a more restful sleep that has not happened. I expected to wake up w/less hip pain since this was said to contour the body better & I do not feel like the hip pain has been any less then before. I expected a more comfortable better quality of sleep & less hip pain by adding this topper to my bed & did not get that.
customer_reviews.author: Becky A

customer_reviews.title: Super soft but doesn't breathe!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Great for back pain -Really soft -Absorbs movement in the night from your partner. Helps a lot for light sleepers -Harder to move on so you don't turn as much through the night Cons: -Doesn't breathe at all -Cuddling is a no go on this because you will burn to death My husband and I love this topper but if you run really hot at night I suggest avoiding it. A small solution is to cover it with a sheet and a thin blanket, for some reason you won't be as hot. If you plan on cuddling make sure you have thin blankets or plan to not use blankets at all while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Let it air out the 48 hours or more
customer_reviews.text: This was for my sons bed which was a little on the stiff side. I thought after the 24 hours the smell would have disipated so I put on his bed because I couldn't smell anything. After he slept on it he said it had a funny smell to it. We took it off and let it set out for an additional 48 hours and placed it back on his bed. The topper didnt have any sent to it anymore and said it was very comfortable. Would reccommend .
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Glad I chose the 3 in because the 2 in ...
customer_reviews.text: Glad I chose the 3 in because the 2 in probably wouldn’t have made much of a difference. I travel for business, doing pet sits in other peoples home, using other peoples beds. Gets very uncomfortable. I bought this during a current stay because their bed is so firm, I had aches and pains everywhere. Still adjusting to the memory foam feeling, a little firmer than I hoped..but I liked how it says it could take 1-2 days to expand.. it only took 5-10 max for it to be completely expanded. There was a strong smell as expected, but it’s already fading away after 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Much more comfortable bed now
customer_reviews.text: I bought this memory foam mattress topper, for not only pain relief but also to spruce up an old mattress. It has definitely helped me to not feel the springs in the mattress any more. My sleep has been better. Hardest part of the whole project was waiting for it to be ready to sleep on. This item was shipped out pretty quickly and came securely packaged. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: ⚾️ This thing is a home run!
customer_reviews.text: I slept in a waterbed for 35 years 🙀 and absolutely loved it. After encountering some degenerative back problems, my therapist encouraged me to switch to a “real bed”😡. I currently have a Lucid 16 mattress and it’s pretty good. But I was having problems with my back and sleeping through the night was a thing of the past. After 5 back surgeries, getting comfortable in bed was impossible😔. We decided to add this Lucid 3” foam mattress to our existing foam bed. I am finally getting some comfort while I sleep🎉. I highly recommend trying this relatively inexpensive addition to your bed. This will change the comfort level of your bed immediately. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: td

customer_reviews.title: Eh.. not so much
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to be a good product because my son loved his so much. It doesn't cushion enough for me. My back aches all the time and I haven't slept soundly since I purchased it. I miss my old topper, but I made it into a dog bed. I wonder if the dog will share it with me?
customer_reviews.author: Debi Tadd

customer_reviews.title: Too soft, sinks in.
customer_reviews.text: This was way too soft and made me sink down. I’m a very petite person weighing 100lbs so I was surprised that I sunk down so much. This made my pain worse for my back and neck pain. It had many good reviews so I decided to purchase it, but I learned don’t always trust the good reviews. I don’t even know if im able to return it, it’s the worst product I’ve bought so far. Unfortunately this product didn’t work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: BaileyM

customer_reviews.title: Nice to sleep on, but not super durable
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of having a thick mattress pad for my bed. It's great, but I tend to sink into it and then get stuck in an uncomfortable position. Additionally, it doesn't really feel that much cooler and when they say "cooler" they mean they put tiny little bits of gel throughout. Not really enough to cool anyone. It's also the most fragile material ever. Just from sleeping on it and moving around it broke in a couple places. Overall, I wouldn't recommend it. Now I use it for whenever guests stay over on my pull out sofa.
customer_reviews.author: c

product_meta.title: Lucid 3-inch Ventilated Gel Memory Foam Mattress Topper - Queen
feature_bullets: 3 inches of ventilated gel memory foam adds softness and pressure-relieving comfort to your mattress at the shoulders, hips and knees
Special memory foam formula is extremely soft, airy and responsive
Ventilated design improves airflow for a more comfortable sleep climate
Memory foam is infused with a plush gel material that captures heat to control temperature
New foam scent is normal and will dissipate over the first 48 hours after opening; This product features a 3-year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars12,246 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 3-year u. S. Warranty guards against manufacturer defect.
